message.name: ERR_XFV_PLANTEMPLATE_SUBGOAL_EXISTS
message.locale: This sub-goal has already been assigned to the plan template and cannot be assigned again.

message.name: ERR_PT_SUBGOAL_ADD_TO_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template sub-goal cannot be assigned to a cancelled plan template.
The plan template sub-goal cannot be assigned to a canceled plan template.

message.name: ERR_PT_SUBGOAL_DELETE_FROM_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template sub-goal cannot be deleted from a canceled plan template.
The plan template sub-goal cannot be deleted from a cancelled plan template.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_ITEM_EXISTS
message.locale: The plan template sub-goal cannot be cancelled as there are plan template plan items assigned to it.
The plan template sub-goal cannot be canceled as there are plan template plan items assigned to it.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_MODIFY_AS_PLAN_ITEM_EXISTS
message.locale: The Sub-Goal cannot be modified as one or more plan items have been added to the template
The Sub-Goal cannot be modified as one or more plan items have been added to the template
